labels.note: Ecommerce Google Analytics module allows you to use the newly launched feature of Google Analytics – Enhanced Ecommerce.
labels.createECommerceTransaction: Send ecommerce transaction in GA when order is created
labels.reverseECommerceTransaction: Reverse ecommerce transaction from GA when order is canceled
